snippet: A judge decided to give a newly appointed prosecutor more time to prepare in one of the country’s most infamous kidnapping cases.
abstract: Justice Maxwell Wiley delays retrial of Pedro Hernandez, man accused of kidnapping and strangling Etan Patz in 1979, until February 2016 to give newly appointed prosecutor Joel J Seidemann more time to prepare for case.
lead_paragraph: A judge decided to give a newly appointed prosecutor more time to prepare in one of the country’s most infamous kidnapping cases.

headline.main: Judge Delays Retrial in Etan Patz Case Until Feb. 22
headline.print_headline: Judge Delays Man’s Retrial in Patz Case Until Feb. 22
